name: tm71
effect: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Stone Edge to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.
